name: Baby Hazel: African Safari
description:
Baby Hazel, along with her parents has gone to South Africa Jungle Safari. They have planned to halt at the safari tent for one night. Join Baby Hazel and her family and enjoy jungle safari with them. At such tender age, Baby Hazel needs to be careful in such places where wildlife is dominating. She needs someone to look after her each moment in such locations; otherwise chances are there that she may get lost in the jungle. So be with darling Baby Hazel and look after her needs in that tropical forest land.
Join Baby Hazel and her per Bruno and enjoy jungle activities. Meet tribal people and make friend with them. Be careful of the wild life and learn how to escape from dangers in the jungle. Play this game and have fun filled jungle safari.
